name: Finally, To Command a Daemon, make a Daemonic Master Test, requiring an Opposed Willpower Test, with +5 per level of Psy Rating the Summoner has. If a Daemon is forced to go against its fundamental nature, it forces a second Daemonic Mastery Test, where the controller now has -30 as the Daemon actively tries to break control

system.novice:
- "The Stars are Right" - Ausicious Circumstances favour the Enactors
- The Enactor has sworn allegiance/is devoted to the Daemon's/God's Cause
- The Enactor is a Psyker with Psy Rating 7+
- The Veil between Reality and the Warp is greatly weakened
- Sacred Numbers are used correctly and appropriately as part of the Ritual
system.adept:
-60 to Curse Test: Character has never met or seen their target
 -50 to Curse Test: Character has seen or been in the presence of their target
 -40 to Curse Test: Character has spoken to their target at least once
 -30 to Curse Test: Character has had minor dealings with their target
 -20 to Curse Test: Character and target know one another in some capacity
 -10 to Curse Test: Character and target have had numerous dealings over several years
 +0  to Curse Test: Character and target have known one naother for many years
